1: %% Author: jens
    2: %% Created: 7 jan 2013
    3: %% Description: TODO: Add description to hty_formtree_resource_tests
    4: -module(hty_formtree_spaf_SUITE).
    5: -compile(export_all).
    6: %%
    7: %% Include files
    8: %%
    9: 
   10: -import(hty_formtree_spaf, [parse/1, parse/2]).
   11: 
   12: %%
   13: %% Exported Functions
   14: %%
   15: all() -> [
   16: 		single_attr,
   17: 		dual_attr,
   18: 		nesting,
   19: 		no_eq,
   20: 		split_attr,
   21: 		apor
   22: ].
   23: 
   24: %%
   25: %% API Functions
   26: %%
   27: single_attr(_C) ->
   28: 	{ok, Q1, []} = parse(<<"apa=lim">>),
   29: 	{ok, _, [{kv, <<"apa">>, <<"lim">>}]} = parse(eos, Q1).
   30: 
   31: dual_attr(_C) ->
   32: 	{ok, Q1, [{kv, <<"apa">>,<<"lim">>}]} = parse(<<"apa=lim&rim=bob">>),
   33: 	{ok, _, [{kv, <<"rim">>,<<"bob">>}]} = parse(eos, Q1).
   34: 
   35: nesting(_C) ->
   36: 	{ok, Q1, []} = parse(<<"[=contactbook">>),
   37: 	{ok, Q2, [{push, <<"contactbook">>}]} = parse(<<"&]=contactbook">>, Q1),
   38: 	{ok, _, [{pop, <<"contactbook">>}]} = parse(eos, Q2).
   39: 
   40: no_eq(_C) ->
   41: 	{ok, Q1, []} = parse(<<"lim">>),
   42: 	{no, missing_eq} = parse(eos, Q1).
   43: 
   44: split_attr(_C) ->
   45: 	{ok, Q1, []} = parse(<<"lim=ko">>),
   46: 	{ok, Q2, []} = parse(<<"rv">>, Q1),
   47: 	{ok, _Q3, [{kv, <<"lim">>, <<"korv">>}]} = parse(eos, Q2).
   48: 
   49: apor(_C) ->
   50: 	Input = <<"[=apor&[=apa&\"=orangutang&]=apa&]=apor">>,
   51: 	Facit = [
   52: 		{push, <<"apor">>},
   53: 		{push, <<"apa">>},
   54: 		{text, <<"orangutang">>},
   55: 		{pop, <<"apa">>},
   56: 		{pop, <<"apor">>}
   57: 	],
   58: 	{ok, Q1, Out} = parse(Input),
   59: 	{ok, Q2, Out2} = parse(eos, Q1),
   60: 	Facit = Out ++ Out2.
   61: %%
   62: %% Local Functions
   63: %%
